text: وَرَدَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِغَيۡظِهِمۡ لَمۡ يَنَالُواْ خَيۡرٗاۚ وَكَفَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱلۡقِتَالَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ قَوِيًّا عَزِيزٗا
translation: Imana Allah Yasubije inyuma ingabo ziyunze ziteterewe zishwe n’ishavu n’akantu ku kudashika ku co zipfuje; nta n’iciza zaronse kuri nya rugamba, haba kw’isi canke mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, Imana Allah Iraheza Ikingira abemeramana kurwana kuri nya rugamba ku bubasha bwayo. Burya Imana Allah, Yamye ari Nyeninguvu, Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa.
